ygData.subject: Re: What to buy to get started?
ygData.msgSnippet: Linda: Welcome--If you ever decide to come to Maelin Starpyre look me and will be glad to help you out and show you the way thru the game :) My ingame name is
ygData.messageBody:
Linda:
Welcome--If you ever decide to come to Maelin Starpyre look me and will
be glad to help you out and show you the way thru the game :)
My ingame name is Tartracheon.
I DEFINITELY agree on purchasing EQ Platinum--you will later on want to
buy the Dragons of Norrath or download online because when you die in
Everquest you have to go back and loot your corpse or do it the
easy way and go to guild lobby and have it summoned to your
feet...lolol
(there is a fee involved for getting a summons in guild lobby but not
that much for low level players.) (in game money--not money from you)
If you need to purchase armour there are now alot of new armour quests
for new players or you can pop into the Bazaar in Plane of Knowledge
and buy something there.
Hope to see on Maelin :)

Tartracheon
Wraiths of Discord
Maelin Starpyre Rules...lolol











--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "lindamiddleton_99"
<lindamiddleton@m...> wrote:
>
> Lots of products to choose from. What products does a newb that has
> never played Everquest before purchase? i.e. How do I get online
> with this game and do I want it or the newest EV II. (Bored with UO
> for sure.)
> Thx in advance. Linda M
>
